name: Quick Channel
text: Your divine energies flash with dazzling speed.
prerequisites: Knowledge (religion) 5 ranks, channel energy class feature.
benefit: You may channel energy as a move action by spending 2 daily uses of that ability.
text_zh: 你的神圣能量以令人目眩的速度闪耀着。
prerequisites_zh: 知识（宗教）5级，【引导能量】职业特性。
benefit_zh: 你可以花费2次每日使用次数，以移动动作使用引导能量。
